Reviews.Title: “Overpriced Vibe”

Reviews.Content: arrived check told additional 3 credit card pay cash stayed private sloppily painted walls door cracked bottom corner bed uncomfortable internet intermittant stayed saturday night band played 11 pm awoken 715 am sunday banging roof hour 12 feel price payed stay 110 stayed nicer hotel lesson learned
